name: PROVIDENCE GAS COMPANY v. Edward F. BURKE, Administrator

parties: PROVIDENCE GAS COMPANY v. Edward F. BURKE, Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petitioner’s motion to consolidate this case with Roberts II et a 1. v. Providence Gas Company, R.I., 408 A.2d 621 is granted.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Hinckley, Allen, Salisbury & Parsons, Michael P. DeFanti, Robert J. Ferranty, Providence, for petitioner, Providence Gas Company.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., John R. McDermott, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
PROVIDENCE GAS COMPANY v. Edward F. BURKE, Administrator.
No. 79-366-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 29, 1979.
Hinckley, Allen, Salisbury & Parsons, Michael P. DeFanti, Robert J. Ferranty, Providence, for petitioner, Providence Gas Company.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., John R. McDermott, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.
